_________________________________________________________________________________________________
I made this extension because I constantly kept getting lost in my chats with chat gpt. It's one of the extensions which I use regularly myself. I hope others also find it useful!

Features: 
* Shows a birds eye view of your chats with the scroll minimap
* Cycle between previous and next chats
* Preview previous and next chats
* Drag and scroll the minimap to the desired position
* Option to autorefresh the minimap periodically

The code for this extension is open source on github. 
Give the repo a star here: https://github.com/Aebel-Shajan/scroll-minimap-for-chatgpt
